title: Redstone Consumer
description: [EXPERIMENTAL] A component describing how a block can consume and potentially propogate a redstone signal

min_power.title: Min Power
min_power.description: Defines the minimum value for incoming signal stregth. If signal strength is greater than or equal to this value then the onRedstoneUpdate event is sent to Scripts.

propogates_power.title: Propogates Power
propogates_power.description: Controls whether a signal can pass through this block or not, defaults to false
